result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Richard A Sefton

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 8:41 am 
INCLUDES 15CM1878, 15CM2143, 15CM2259, 16CM40, 16CM199, 16CM205, AND 16CM621. 
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher; Def appears in person with Atty Lou Ann Bohn.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to: 
In 16CM40: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 16CM199: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 16CM205: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 16CM621: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CM1878: Ct. 1 (OWI 4th)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CM2143: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 15CM2259: Ct. 1 (Misd. BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 15CM1878: Ct. 1>>SWH for 2 years probation - CONDITIONS: $2605 inclusive (includes DNA surcharge) plus $165 AODA fee: DNA sample; SSTOP; 170 days MCJ with huber for work/treatment if def qualifies - 125 days STAYED and 45 days to be served with 45 days to report at agent's discretion; absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed; AODA; complete Driver's Safety programming; 30 months dl revocation with admin credit; 30 month IID; 6 pts against dl. 
In 15CM2143: Ct. 1>>SWH for 2 years probation - CONDITIONS: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by dept; complete driver's safety program; DNA sample and surcharge; CC. 
In 15CM2259: Ct. 1>>SWH for 2 years probation - CONDITIONS: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; complete driver's safety program; DNA sample and surcharge; CC. 
COURT ORDERS all sentences to run concurrent. 
COURT finds def entitled to 2 days jail credit in 15CM1878 and  NO days jail in 15CM2143 and 15CM2259. 

Atty Bohn makes request re: cash bond, IID exemptions, and half priced IID. 
COURT ORDERS cash bond returned to poster (M.S.) in 16CM199 and 16CM205. 
COURT signs order for IID exemptions in 15CM1878. 
COURT ORDERS half priced IID in 15CM1878. 

Adj: 9:03 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 3, 2016 at 08:30 am.

dft
PTC 2/2/16 - not in custody
notices returned
